text: Audrey Caroline Emerton, Baroness Emerton DBE, GCStJ, FRCN (born 10 September 1935) is a British crossbench member of the House of Lords."Dame Audrey Emerton resigns as Chancellor and Chief Commander of St John Ambulance", guardian.co.uk; accessed 7 April 2016. She was appointed a Dame Commander of the Order of the British Empire in the 1989 New Year Honours. She was created a life peer as Baroness Emerton, of Tunbridge Wells in the County of Kent and of Clerkenwell in the London Borough of Islington on 17 February 1997. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:United Kingdom Life Peers
title: Audrey Emerton, Baroness Emerton
